name: Securline
description: Surgical skin marker for hospital use. It comes with a versatile tip with precise fine line marking or broad line marking (when held at an angle). Gentian violet ink used is nontoxic, non-tatooing and surgical prep-resistant. Markings can be removed from the skin with isopropyl alcohol. Includes a separate six inch, flexible ruler calibrated in both inches and centimeters.

name: Stille
description: Reusable surgical instruments from Sweden. Each instrument is made of top quality stainless steel, handcrafted by skilled instrument makers, and undergoes rigorous quality inspection.

name: Toray
description: Inoue-Balloon catheter set for PTMC (Percutaneous Transvenous Mitral Commissurotomy) in patients with mitral stenosis
